name: Fortuna.AI
description:
* PLAY THE GAME IN FULL SCREEN FOR FULL EFFECT*

Welcome to Fortuna.AI. An attempted application of cold reading in the digital world. Is Fortuna.AI psychic? That is for you to discover. Let us see what the cards hold for you.

Be warned, this program is temperamental...

Instructions: Point and click your way through this AI trial.

Credits:

- Programming/Design: Drew White

- Art/Design: Zoe Naylor

Assets:

- Music: Halloween 8-bit by batmetal (freesounds)

Created for MSU Spartasoft Game Jam 11/18/22.
